channel.title: Comments on: Automated Job Activation with Mirroring and Availability Groups
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Luke MacDonald
item.dc:creator: Luke MacDonald
item.description:
This didn't work for me but it could be because I am not sure what I should be inserting into the table Mirror_Jobs for the RunStatus, Active and Role columns. Can you please specify?
Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
This didn’t work for me but it could be because I am not sure what I should be inserting into the table Mirror_Jobs for the RunStatus, Active and Role columns. Can you please specify?

Thanks.

item.title: By: sara
item.dc:creator: sara
item.description:
Hi..thanks for this post. didn't work for me. could you please give more detail steps on the needed jobs to be created on mirror server? also does the database mentioned on the table has to be related to the job?
Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Hi..thanks for this post. didn’t work for me. could you please give more detail steps on the needed jobs to be created on mirror server? also does the database mentioned on the table has to be related to the job?
